00039 ConfigMenu::ConfigMenu(void)
00040   : Menu("cli-config", Help()
00041         .AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "CLI settings menu")
00042         .AddHelp(Help::LANG_FR, "Menu de configuration du CLI")),
00043     m_pcliEcho(NULL), m_pcliEchoOn(NULL), m_pcliEchoOff(NULL),
00044     m_pcliBeep(NULL), m_pcliBeepOn(NULL), m_pcliBeepOff(NULL),
00045     m_pcliLang(NULL), m_pcliEnglishLang(NULL), m_pcliFrenchLang(NULL)
00046     #ifdef _DEBUG
00047     , m_pcliCheck(NULL), m_pcliCheckIO(NULL), m_pcliOutChar(NULL)
00048     #endif
00049 {
00050 }
00051 
00052 ConfigMenu::~ConfigMenu(void)
00053 {
00054 }

00056 void ConfigMenu::SetCli(Cli& CLI_Cli)
00057 {
00058     Menu::SetCli(CLI_Cli);
00059     {   Help cli_Help(Help()
00060             .AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Modify echo behavior")
00061             .AddHelp(Help::LANG_FR, "Configuration de l'écho"));
00062         m_pcliEcho = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& AddElement(new Keyword("echo", cli_Help)));
00063         {   Help cli_Help(Help()
00064                 .AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Set echo on")
00065                 .AddHelp(Help::LANG_FR, "Activation de l'écho"));
00066             m_pcliEchoOn = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& m_pcliEcho->AddElement(new Keyword("on", cli_Help)));
00067             m_pcliEchoOn->AddElement(new Endl(cli_Help)); }
00068         {   Help cli_Help(Help()
00069                 .AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Set echo off")
00070                 .AddHelp(Help::LANG_FR, "Désactivation de l'écho"));
00071             m_pcliEchoOff = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& m_pcliEcho->AddElement(new Keyword("off", cli_Help)));
00072             m_pcliEchoOff->AddElement(new Endl(cli_Help)); }}
00073     {   Help cli_Help(Help()
00074             .AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Modify beep behavior")
00075             .AddHelp(Help::LANG_FR, "Configuration du bip"));
00076         m_pcliBeep = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& AddElement(new Keyword("beep", cli_Help)));
00077         {   Help cli_Help(Help()
00078                 .AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Set beep on")
00079                 .AddHelp(Help::LANG_FR, "Activation du bip"));
00080             m_pcliBeepOn = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& m_pcliBeep->AddElement(new Keyword("on", cli_Help)));
00081             m_pcliBeepOn->AddElement(new Endl(cli_Help)); }
00082         {   Help cli_Help(Help()
00083                 .AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Set beep off")
00084                 .AddHelp(Help::LANG_FR, "Désactivation du bip"));
00085             m_pcliBeepOff = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& m_pcliBeep->AddElement(new Keyword("off", cli_Help)));
00086             m_pcliBeepOff->AddElement(new Endl(cli_Help)); }}
00087     {   Help cli_Help(Help()
00088             .AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Language setting")
00089             .AddHelp(Help::LANG_FR, "Modification de la langue"));
00090         m_pcliLang = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& AddElement(new Keyword("lang", cli_Help)));
00091         {   Help cli_Help(Help()
00092                 .AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "English language")
00093                 .AddHelp(Help::LANG_FR, "Langue anglaise"));
00094             m_pcliEnglishLang = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& m_pcliLang->AddElement(new Keyword("english", cli_Help)));
00095             m_pcliEnglishLang->AddElement(new Endl(cli_Help)); }
00096         {   Help cli_Help(Help()
00097                 .AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "French language")
00098                 .AddHelp(Help::LANG_FR, "Langue française"));
00099             m_pcliFrenchLang = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& m_pcliLang->AddElement(new Keyword("french", cli_Help)));
00100             m_pcliFrenchLang->AddElement(new Endl(cli_Help)); }}
00101     #ifdef _DEBUG
00102     {   Help cli_Help(Help()
00103             .AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Check CLI stuff")
00104             .AddHelp(Help::LANG_FR, "Vérifications du CLI"));
00105         m_pcliCheck = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& AddElement(new Keyword("check", cli_Help)));
00106         {   Help cli_Help(Help()
00107                 .AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Check input/output")
00108                 .AddHelp(Help::LANG_FR, "Vérification des entrées/sorties"));
00109             m_pcliCheckIO = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& m_pcliCheck->AddElement(new Keyword("io-device", cli_Help)));
00110             m_pcliCheckIO->AddElement(new Endl(cli_Help));
00111             {   Help cli_Help(Help()
00112                     .AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Check output character")
00113                     .AddHelp(Help::LANG_FR, "Vérification sorties de caractères"));
00114                 m_pcliOutChar = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& m_pcliCheckIO->AddElement(new Keyword("outputs", cli_Help)));
00115                 m_pcliOutChar->AddElement(new Endl(cli_Help)); }}}
00116     #endif
00117 }
00118 
00119 const bool ConfigMenu::ExecuteReserved(const CommandLine& CLI_CmdLine) const
00120 {
00121     CommandLineIterator it(CLI_CmdLine);
00122 
00123     if (! it.StepIt()) { return false; }
00124     else if (it == GetEchoNode())
00125     {
00126         if (! it.StepIt()) { return false; }
00127         else if (it == GetEchoOnNode())
00128         {
00129             if (! it.StepIt()) { return false; }
00130             if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(*it))
00131             {
00132                 EchoOn();
00133                 return true;
00134             }
00135         }
00136         else if (it == GetEchoOffNode())
00137         {
00138             if (! it.StepIt()) { return false; }
00139             if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(*it))
00140             {
00141                 EchoOff();
00142                 return true;
00143             }
00144         }
00145     }
00146     else if (it == GetBeepNode())
00147     {
00148         if (! it.StepIt()) { return false; }
00149         else if (it == GetBeepOnNode())
00150         {
00151             if (! it.StepIt()) { return false; }
00152             if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(*it))
00153             {
00154                 BeepOn();
00155                 return true;
00156             }
00157         }
00158         else if (it == GetBeepOffNode())
00159         {
00160             if (! it.StepIt()) { return false; }
00161             if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(*it))
00162             {
00163                 BeepOff();
00164                 return true;
00165             }
00166         }
00167     }
00168     else if (it == GetLangNode())
00169     {
00170         if (! it.StepIt()) { return false; }
00171         else if (it == GetEnglishLangNode())
00172         {
00173             if (! it.StepIt()) { return false; }
00174             if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(*it))
00175             {
00176                 SetLang(ResourceString::LANG_EN);
00177                 return true;
00178             }
00179         }
00180         else if (it == GetFrenchLangNode())
00181         {
00182             if (! it.StepIt()) { return false; }
00183             if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(*it))
00184             {
00185                 SetLang(ResourceString::LANG_FR);
00186                 return true;
00187             }
00188         }
00189     }
00190     #ifdef _DEBUG
00191     else if (it == GetCheckNode())
00192     {
00193         if (! it.StepIt()) { return false; }
00194         else if (it == GetCheckIONode())
00195         {
00196             if (! it.StepIt()) { return false; }
00197             else if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(*it))
00198             {
00199                 CheckIODevice();
00200                 return true;
00201             }
00202             else if (it == GetOutCharNode())
00203             {
00204                 if (! it.StepIt()) { return false; }
00205                 if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(*it))
00206                 {
00207                     CheckOutChar();
00208                     return true;
00209                 }
00210             }
00211         }
00212     }
00213     #endif
00214 
00215     return Menu::ExecuteReserved(CLI_CmdLine);
00216 }
00217 
00218 const bool ConfigMenu::Execute(const CommandLine& CLI_CmdLine) const
00219 {
00220     return false;
00221 }
00222 
00223 void ConfigMenu::EchoOn(void) const
00224 {
00225     GetShell().EnableStream(ECHO_STREAM, true);
00226     const ResourceString cli_EchoOn = ResourceString()
00227         .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_EN, "echo is on")
00228         .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_FR, "écho activé");
00229     GetOutputStream() << cli_EchoOn.GetString(GetShell().GetLang()) << endl;
00230 }
00231 
00232 void ConfigMenu::EchoOff(void) const
00233 {
00234     GetShell().EnableStream(ECHO_STREAM, false);
00235     const ResourceString cli_EchoOff = ResourceString()
00236         .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_EN, "echo is off")
00237         .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_FR, "écho désactivé");
00238     GetOutputStream() << cli_EchoOff.GetString(GetShell().GetLang()) << endl;
00239 }
00240 
00241 void ConfigMenu::BeepOn(void) const
00242 {
00243     GetShell().SetBeep(true);
00244     const ResourceString cli_BeepOn = ResourceString()
00245         .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_EN, "beep is on")
00246         .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_FR, "bip activé");
00247     GetOutputStream() << cli_BeepOn.GetString(GetShell().GetLang()) << endl;
00248 }
00249 
00250 void ConfigMenu::BeepOff(void) const
00251 {
00252     GetShell().SetBeep(false);
00253     const ResourceString cli_BeepOff = ResourceString()
00254         .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_EN, "beep is off")
00255         .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_FR, "bip désactivé");
00256     GetOutputStream() << cli_BeepOff.GetString(GetShell().GetLang()) << endl;
00257 }
00258 
00259 void ConfigMenu::SetLang(const ResourceString::LANG E_Lang) const
00260 {
00261     GetShell().SetLang(E_Lang);
00262     const ResourceString cli_SelectedLanguage = ResourceString()
00263         .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_EN, "English language")
00264         .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_FR, "Langue française");
00265     GetOutputStream() << cli_SelectedLanguage.GetString(GetShell().GetLang()) << endl;
00266 }
00267 
00268 #ifdef _DEBUG
00269 void ConfigMenu::CheckIODevice(void) const
00270 {
00271     class Press {
00272         public: static const bool Key(const Shell& CLI_Shell, const char* const STR_Message, const KEY E_Key) {
00273             if (E_Key == BREAK)
00274             {
00275                 CLI_Shell.GetStream(OUTPUT_STREAM) << endl;
00276                 CLI_Shell.GetStream(OUTPUT_STREAM) << "Please follow the instructions, and press one by one the expected characters." << endl;
00277                 CLI_Shell.GetStream(OUTPUT_STREAM) << endl;
00278             }
00279 
00280             for (KEY e_Key = NULL_KEY; e_Key != E_Key; )
00281             {
00282                 CLI_Shell.GetStream(OUTPUT_STREAM) << STR_Message << endl;
00283                 e_Key = CLI_Shell.GetInput().GetKey();
00284 
00285                 if ((e_Key == NULL_KEY)
00286                     || ((e_Key == BREAK) && (E_Key != BREAK)))
00287                 {
00288                     // Abort
00289                     return false;
00290                 }
00291                 if ((e_Key == ESCAPE) && (E_Key != ESCAPE) && (E_Key != BREAK))
00292                 {
00293                     // Skip character
00294                     return true;
00295                 }
00296 
00297                 if (e_Key != E_Key)
00298                 {
00299                     CLI_Shell.GetStream(ERROR_STREAM) << "Invalid key " << (int) e_Key << endl;
00300                 }
00301             }
00302 
00303             if (E_Key == ESCAPE)
00304             {
00305                 CLI_Shell.GetStream(OUTPUT_STREAM) << endl;
00306                 CLI_Shell.GetStream(OUTPUT_STREAM) << "From now, press ESCAPE to skip a character entry, press CTRL+C to abort the procedure." << endl;
00307                 CLI_Shell.GetStream(OUTPUT_STREAM) << endl;
00308             }
00309 
00310             return true;
00311         }
00312     };
00313 
00314     // First of all, check break and escape.
00315     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press the break sequence (CTRL+C)", BREAK)) return;
00316     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press ESCAPE", ESCAPE)) return;
00317 
00318     // Logout sequence
00319     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press the logout sequence (CTRL+D)", LOGOUT)) return;
00320 
00321     // Spacing keys
00322     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press the space bar", SPACE)) return;
00323     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press TAB", TAB)) return;
00324     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press ENTER", ENTER)) return;
00325 
00326     // Deletion keys
00327     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press BACKSPACE", BACKSPACE)) return;
00328     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press SUPPR", DELETE)) return;
00329     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press the clean screen sequence (CTRL+L)", CLS)) return;
00330 
00331     // Navigation keys
00332     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press the UP arrow key", KEY_UP)) return;
00333     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press the DOWN arrow key", KEY_DOWN)) return;
00334     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press the LEFT arrow key", KEY_LEFT)) return;
00335     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press the RIGHT arrow key", KEY_RIGHT)) return;
00336     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press the PAGE UP key", PAGE_UP)) return;
00337     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press the PAGE UP key (CTRL+UP)", PAGE_UP)) return;
00338     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press the PAGE DOWN key", PAGE_DOWN)) return;
00339     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press the PAGE DOWN key (CTRL+DOWN)", PAGE_DOWN)) return;
00340     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press the PAGE LEFT key", PAGE_LEFT)) return;
00341     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press the PAGE LEFT key (CTRL+LEFT)", PAGE_LEFT)) return;
00342     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press the PAGE RIGHT key", PAGE_RIGHT)) return;
00343     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press the PAGE RIGHT key (CTRL+RIGHT)", PAGE_RIGHT)) return;
00344     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press the BEGIN key (or HOME key)", KEY_BEGIN)) return;
00345     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press the BEGIN key (CTRL+A)", KEY_BEGIN)) return;
00346     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press the END key", KEY_END)) return;
00347     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press the END key (CTRL+E)", KEY_END)) return;
00348     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press the PREVIOUS key", PREVIOUS)) return;
00349     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press the NEXT key", NEXT)) return;
00350 
00351     // Modifiers
00352     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press the INSERT key", INSERT)) return;
00353     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press the copy sequence (ALT+C)", COPY)) return;
00354     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press the copy sequence (CTRL+INS)", COPY)) return;
00355     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press the cut sequence (ALT+X)", CUT)) return;
00356     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press the cut sequence (SHIFT+SUPPR)", CUT)) return;
00357     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press the paste sequence (ALT+V)", PASTE)) return;
00358     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press the paste sequence (SHIFT+INSERT)", PASTE)) return;
00359     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press the undo sequence (ALT+Z)", UNDO)) return;
00360     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press the undo sequence (CTRL+Z)", UNDO)) return;
00361     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press the redo sequence (ALT+Y)", REDO)) return;
00362     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press the redo sequence (CTRL+Y)", REDO)) return;
00363 
00364     // Number keys
00365     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press '0'", KEY_0)) return;
00366     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press '1'", KEY_1)) return;
00367     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press '2'", KEY_2)) return;
00368     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press '3'", KEY_3)) return;
00369     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press '4'", KEY_4)) return;
00370     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press '5'", KEY_5)) return;
00371     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press '6'", KEY_6)) return;
00372     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press '7'", KEY_7)) return;
00373     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press '8'", KEY_8)) return;
00374     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press '9'", KEY_9)) return;
00375     // Letters
00376     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'a'", KEY_a)) return;
00377     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'b'", KEY_b)) return;
00378     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'c'", KEY_c)) return;
00379     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'd'", KEY_d)) return;
00380     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'e'", KEY_e)) return;
00381     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'f'", KEY_f)) return;
00382     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'g'", KEY_g)) return;
00383     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'h'", KEY_h)) return;
00384     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'i'", KEY_i)) return;
00385     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'j'", KEY_j)) return;
00386     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'k'", KEY_k)) return;
00387     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'l'", KEY_l)) return;
00388     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'm'", KEY_m)) return;
00389     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'n'", KEY_n)) return;
00390     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'o'", KEY_o)) return;
00391     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'p'", KEY_p)) return;
00392     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'q'", KEY_q)) return;
00393     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'r'", KEY_r)) return;
00394     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 's'", KEY_s)) return;
00395     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 't'", KEY_t)) return;
00396     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'u'", KEY_u)) return;
00397     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'v'", KEY_v)) return;
00398     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'w'", KEY_w)) return;
00399     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'x'", KEY_x)) return;
00400     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'y'", KEY_y)) return;
00401     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'z'", KEY_z)) return;
00402     // Capital letters
00403     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'A'", KEY_A)) return;
00404     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'B'", KEY_B)) return;
00405     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'C'", KEY_C)) return;
00406     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'D'", KEY_D)) return;
00407     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'E'", KEY_E)) return;
00408     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'F'", KEY_F)) return;
00409     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'G'", KEY_G)) return;
00410     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'H'", KEY_H)) return;
00411     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'I'", KEY_I)) return;
00412     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'J'", KEY_J)) return;
00413     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'K'", KEY_K)) return;
00414     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'L'", KEY_L)) return;
00415     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'M'", KEY_M)) return;
00416     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'N'", KEY_N)) return;
00417     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'O'", KEY_O)) return;
00418     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'P'", KEY_P)) return;
00419     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'Q'", KEY_Q)) return;
00420     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'R'", KEY_R)) return;
00421     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'S'", KEY_S)) return;
00422     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'T'", KEY_T)) return;
00423     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'U'", KEY_U)) return;

00428     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'Z'", KEY_Z)) return;
00429     // Accentuated characters
00430     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'á' ('a' acute)", KEY_aacute)) return;
00431     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'à' ('a' grave)", KEY_agrave)) return;
00432     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'ä' ('a' uml)", KEY_auml)) return;
00433     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'â' ('a' circ)", KEY_acirc)) return;
00434     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'ç' ('c' cedil)", KEY_ccedil)) return;
00435     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'é' ('e' acute)", KEY_eacute)) return;
00436     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'è' ('e' grave)", KEY_egrave)) return;
00437     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'ë' ('e' uml)", KEY_euml)) return;
00438     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'ê' ('e' circ)", KEY_ecirc)) return;
00439     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'í' ('i' acute)", KEY_iacute)) return;
00440     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'ì' ('i' grave)", KEY_igrave)) return;
00441     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'ï' ('i' uml)", KEY_iuml)) return;
00442     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'î' ('i' circ)", KEY_icirc)) return;
00443     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'ó' ('o' acute)", KEY_oacute)) return;
00444     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'ò' ('o' grave)", KEY_ograve)) return;
00445     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'ö' ('o' uml)", KEY_ouml)) return;

00449     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'ü' ('u' uml)", KEY_uuml)) return;
00450     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press 'û' ('u' circ)", KEY_ucirc)) return;
00451 
00452     // Special characters / ponctuation
00453     if (! Press::Key(GetShell(), "Press '+' (plus)", PLUS)) return;

00506 
00507 void ConfigMenu::CheckOutChar(void) const
00508 {
00509     GetShell().GetStream(OUTPUT_STREAM) << "Press CTRL+C to abort the following outputs." << endl;
00510 
00511     for (int i=-128; i<128; i++)
00512     {
00513         GetShell().GetStream(OUTPUT_STREAM) << i << ": " << (char) i << endl;
00514         if (GetShell().GetInput().GetKey() == BREAK)
00515         {
00516             break;
00517         }
00518     }
00519 }
00520 #endif
